segments.text: I see two children trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool that looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the cookie jar, trying to get as many as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing next to him, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why they don't just ask for cookies instead of sneaking them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable; I'm worried he might fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to be helping him, but she's not touching the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they're both being very careful not to make any noise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet doors frame the boy, making him look like he's in a cookie jar hideout.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the jar is labeled 'COOKIE JAR,' so there's no mistaking what they're after.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they hurry up before the woman turns around and catches them.
segments.speaker: PAR
